subject: Golf
PGA Championship
Arnold Palmer Invitational (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Hoffmann, who is winless in 67 PGA Tour starts, finished with a 65 to take a three-stroke lead Friday, one day after learning that his grandmother had died.
snippet: Hoffmann, who is winless in 67 PGA Tour starts, finished with a 65 to take a three-stroke lead Friday, one day after learning that his grandmother had died.
